tool_description: Coordinates call transfers between agents, departments, or external systems while maintaining call context and history.

current_agent.description: ID of the agent currently handling the call

target_agent.description: ID of the target agent or department for transfer

call_context.description: Summary of call context to preserve during transfer

transfer_type.description: Type of transfer: warm, cold, or conference

error_messages: Invalid transfer type: Must be one of [warm, cold, conference].
Target agent unavailable: Selected target agent is not available for transfer.
Transfer failed: Technical issue prevented successful call transfer.
Context preservation failed: Unable to maintain call context during transfer.
Circular transfer detected: Transfer would create a routing loop.
usage: Provide current_agent, target_agent, transfer_reason, and call_context with optional transfer_type to coordinate call transfer.

transfer_status.description: Status of the transfer attempt (successful, failed, pending)

new_agent_id.description: ID of the agent now handling the call

context_preserved.description: Whether call context was successfully preserved
